entry.title: Winter Storm Warning issued March 01 at 5:49PM AKST until March 02 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...SNOW SHOWERS FOR THE REST OF THE EVENING FOR MANY AREAS... A storm force low over northern gulf coast continues to send plently of moisture and wind into the panhandle today.
